headline: Is Coca-Cola (KO) Still Attractive After Strong Multi‑Year Share Price Gains
summary: If you are wondering whether Coca-Cola shares are offering fair value at around US$72.01, you are not alone. This article is built to walk you through that question in a clear, practical way. Over the recent past, the stock has recorded returns of 0.8% over 7 days, 2.6% over 30 days, 4.2% year to date, 20.0% over 1 year, 29.3% over 3 years and 72.5% over 5 years, which naturally raises questions about what is already priced in and what might still be on the table.
